title: Chapter 326 - Netherworld Lightning Cleaves The Soul, A Hundred-Foot Sword Curtain
volume_title: For Whom Do The Funeral Bells Toll In The Jade Capital?
body:
Chapter 326 - Netherworld Lightning Cleaves The Soul, A Hundred-Foot Sword Curtain

You Tianhong’s slash was mighty, but many weren’t at all surprised. 

This was a peak Grain Avoidance Realm existence, someone whose name had long since shaken the nation. He ought to have attainments in the Dao of the Sword sufficient to shock the world.

Only then could he live up to his reputation.

They were more curious to see how Su Yi planned to break through this attack. Thus, the moment You Tianhong swung his sword, the gazes of those peak experts in attendance immediately landed on Su Yi.

They then watched as—

“Break.” 

Su Yi just casually swung his fist into the distance. 

Boom!

Vast, ink-dark origin power condensed, and the black fist light transformed into a radiant pillar, which charged into the snow-white sword qi.

Su Yi was a peak fourth-level Grandmaster. Recently, he’d taken to consuming a Nine Apertures Dragon Tiger Pill to temper his cultivation once every three days. 

His cultivation and accumulations were far greater than before. Were Li Changning here now, this fist would have shattered him effortlessly.

Rumble!

Snow-white sword intent drew on the unreadable Yin Lightning Sword Intent and clashed with the dark fist force.

It was as if lightning went off on Ocean View Plateau. The aftershock of the collision spread out in all directions,...
